alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:58PM CDT until July 21 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Pickens County in west central Alabama... Northwestern Greene County in west central Alabama... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carrollton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Aliceville, Carrollton, Pickensville, Memphis, McMullen, Garden, Mantua, Jena, Benevola, Johnston Lake, Bevill Lock And Dam, Gainesville Lake Campground, Snoddy, Dillburg, George Downer Airport, Kirk, Pioneer, Cochrane and Lewiston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Birmingham.
